title: Building Single Page Applications with ASP.NET Core 2.1
thumbnailDescription: Building Single Page Applications with ASP.NET Core 2.1
sessionTitle: Building Single Page Applications with ASP.NET Core 2.1
eventDescription: ​​​​​​Most people think Azure Functions are only for a tiny bit of code. They will be surprised! Why not build your whole application following best practices and only expose the endpoints through functions? In this talk, I'll present a new paradigm, a new way of thinking whilst still leveraging your existing knowledge.​
